title: Effigies
text: These are the main focus of the game and should not be too easily accessible for the opposing players. Try to have them adjacent to the deployment zone, and they do not need to be centred. Avoid placing terrain directly in front and blocking access to them. This can hamper opponents but also the owning player's manoeuvrability may be adversely affected. Avoid placing Effigies too far into the middle of the map, as bringing a Hero up to attack an opposing Effigy should be difficult to achieve.
